metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35827 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.3.8. A use-after-free was found in ravb_remove in drivers/net/ethernet/renesas/ravb_main.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
